entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or a few thunderstorms changing to rain showers at times heavy this evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
